channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Marrying for health insurance? The ACA cost crisis forces some drastic choices
item.description: While Congress debates bringing back Affordable Care Act subsidies , many Americans have already made life-altering decisions to afford health care.

item.title: Who are the figure skaters representing Team USA? Key names and backstories to know

item.title: Exercise is as effective as medication in treating depression, study finds
item.description: New research shows exercise is as effective as medication at reducing symptoms of depression. And you don't need to run a marathon to see benefits. So...

item.title: How IVF has led to a record number of single moms in their 40s
item.description: Who gets to be a parent has been reshaped by IVF: Single women in their 40s are increasingly opting to become moms.

item.title: How to responsibly recycle your children's old toys

item.title: inDrive turns to ads and groceries to diversify revenue
item.description: Advertising on inDrive is being rolled out across its top 20 markets following mid-2025 tests.

item.title: These Gen Zers just raised $11.75M to put Africa’s defense back in the hands of Africans
item.description: African defense company Terra comes out of stealth with a $11.75M round led by Joe Lonsdale's 8VC.

item.title: George Floyd and Renee Good: 5 years between Minneapolis videos, and confusion has increased
Motional puts AI at center of robotaxi reboot as it targets 2026 for driverless service
item.description: Motional says it will launch a driverless robotaxi service in Las Vegas before the end of 2026.

item.title: Google co-founders may be leaving California
item.description: Sergey Brin and Larry Page appear to be pulling back from the state where they co-founded Google.

item.title: Video captures Minneapolis immigration arrest in a city on edge after shooting of Renee Good
item.description: Federal agents are carrying out immigration arrests in Minnesota’s Twin Cities region already shaken by the fatal shooting of a woman.

item.title: A Minneapolis church holds a service of ‘Lament and Hope’ amid fears over immigration crackdown
Instagram says there’s been ‘no breach’ despite password reset requests
item.description: Instagram says that although some users received suspicious-looking password reset requests, it has not been breached.
